name: zadanie4
description: 1. create config.php in root dir 2. add PHP constants into **config.php** with define for following data    1. ROUTING       1. BASE_URL - eg https://wt104.fei.stuba.sk/zadanie3       2. ROUTING_PREFIX - zadanie3    2. GOOGLE OAUTH       1. CLIENT_ID       2. CLIENT_SECRET       3. REDIRECT_URI    3. DATABASE       1. DB_HOST       2. DB_NAME       3. DB_USER       4. DB_PASS 3. clone this repo 4. run composer install 5. run npm install 6. ENJOY!
